Text: Invoice Josef SchulzDear Jeff following my phonecall from some time ago I was waiting for the promised cheque for the Josef Schulz work you purchased at this years Art Chicago Until today I did not get this cheque and I was wondering if something went wrong or the cheque got lost in the mail Could you please be so kind and check this issue If there is any problem in sending a cheque in general you can also wire the money if you prefer to do so Here are the details of our account Bank Landesbank BadenWuerttemberg Karlsruhe Account BLZ Bank registration number Account holder Galerie Haus Schneider SWIFT code SOLADEST Please excuse this email if you did send the cheque in the meantime However it would be very nice if you could drop me an answer by email anyhow With warmest regards HeinzMartin Weigand Galerie Haus Schneider
